synopsis.text:
Japaneseâ€“Saudi Arabian animated film, The Journey, co-produced by Toei Animation and Manga Productions and directed by Shizuno Koubun, takes viewers on an inspiring adventure to the holy city of Mecca. The peaceful city faces an imminent threat from the formidable General Abraha and his massive army, who aim to conquer Mecca, enslave its people, and demolish the sacred Kaaba.

Aws, a humble potter with a hidden past, finds himself among the few brave souls who choose to stay and defend their city against overwhelming odds. When Aws encounters his long-lost friend Zurara, an atheist mercenary, among the defenders, their shared history is revealed. Despite their differences, the two friends unite in an attempt to protect their beloved city and its people.

As fear and doubt loom over the defenders, Aws' unwavering faith and determination inspire his fellow citizens to stand strong against the approaching enemy. With nothing but their love for their city and their simple defenses, the people of Mecca prepare for the impending battle. Will they be able to triumph over the colossal army and safeguard their homes, families, and sacred sanctuary? Join Aws and his friends in this epic tale of courage, faith, and redemption.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
